entry.string: Welcome to this Dynamic Example module...
entry.translation: Velcume-a tu thees Dynemeec Ixemple-a mudoole-a...

entry.string: You will find 4 different approaches for viewing and displaying dynamic items, as explained in the code and templates.
entry.translation: Yuoo veell feend 4 deefffferent epprueches fur feeooing und deespleying dynemeec items, es ixpleeened in zee cude-a und templetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: For your own modules, choose any one of them depending on how much (and where) you want to customize...
entry.translation: Fur yuoor oovn mudooles, chuuse-a uny oone-a ooff zeem dependeeng oon hoo mooch (und vhere-a) yuoo vunt tu coostumeeze-a...
